column3: Weight (1=completely unimportant, 2= unimportant, 3= indifferent, 4= important, 5=absolutely important)
column4: Confidence  (1=very low, 2= low, 3= half sure, 4= high, 5=very high)

column5: It is not clear who “We” in the 7th sentence is
Since there is not much information delivered, I think this is not focussing well on the common theme of the summarized documents
Overall it seems to be more like an advertisement and raising a lot of (rhetorical) questions which are not giving that much information
